17 DeviceInputInterface::DeviceInputInterface(DeviceInputInterface&& src) noexcept {
18 *this = std::move(src);
19 }
20
21
22 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::operator=(DeviceInputInterface&& rhs) noexcept {
23 if (this != &rhs) {
24 _callback = rhs._callback;
25 if (_callback._owner)
26 _callback._owner = this;
27
28 _parent_device = rhs._parent_device;
29 _enabled = rhs._enabled;
30 _impl = std::move(rhs._impl);
31
32 // Make sure to disable the rhs
33 rhs._parent_device = nullptr;
34 rhs._enabled = false;
35 }
36
37 return *this;
38 }
39
40
41 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::start() {
42 if (!_impl) load_impl();
43
44 if (!_enabled) {
45 enable();
46 }
47
48 _impl->StartStreams();
49
50 return *this;
51 }
52
53
54 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::pause() {
55 if (!_impl) load_impl();
56
57 const auto result = _impl->PauseStreams();
58
59 if (result != S_OK) {
60 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
61 << errmsg("Unexpected error")
62 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkInput::PauseStreams")
63 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
64 );
65 }
66
67 return *this;
68 }
69
70
71 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::stop() {
72 if (!_impl) load_impl();
73
74 const auto result = _impl->StopStreams();
75
76 // E_ACCESSDENIED means that the stream is already stopped
77 if (result != S_OK && result != E_ACCESSDENIED) {
78 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
79 << errmsg("Unexpected error")
80 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkInput::StopStreams")
81 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
82 );
83 }
84
85 return *this;
86 }
87
88
89 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::flush() {
90 if (!_impl) load_impl();
91
92 const auto result = _impl->FlushStreams();
93
94 if (result != S_OK) {
95 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
96 << errmsg("Unexpected error")
97 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkInput::FlushStreams")
98 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
99 );
100 }
101
102 return *this;
103 }
104
105
106 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::enable() {
107 if (!_parent_device->supports_input_format_detection()) {
108 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(runtime_error()
109 << errmsg(
110 "This device does not support automatic input format detection. The input must be enabled manually.")
111 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
112 );
113 }
114
115 // For automatic format detection we need to grab a valid display mode and pixel format
116 const auto display_modes = get_all_supported_display_modes();
117 if (display_modes.empty()) {
118 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(runtime_error()
119 << errmsg("The input device has no supported display modes")
120 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
121 );
122 };
123
124 auto flags = VideoInputFlags::Default;
125 if (_parent_device->supports_input_format_detection())
126 flags = VideoInputFlags::EnableFormatDetection;
127
128 const auto display_mode = display_modes.front();
129 const auto pixel_formats = get_supported_pixel_formats(display_mode.get_image_format());
130
131 // If a display mode is supported it should have at least on valid pixel format
132 assert(!pixel_formats.empty());
133
134 // Now we can enable the interface
135 enable(display_mode.get_image_format(), pixel_formats.front(), { flags });
136
137 _enabled = true;
138 return *this;
139 }
140
141
142 DeviceInputInterface&DeviceInputInterface::enable(
143 const ImageFormat image_format,
144 const PixelFormat pixel_format,
145 const BitMask<VideoInputFlags>& flags
146 ) {
147 if (!_impl) load_impl();
148
149 DisplayModeSupport support = supports_video_mode(image_format, pixel_format, flags);
150 if (support == DisplayModeSupport::NotSupported) {
151 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(runtime_error()
152 << errmsg("The desired input configuration is not supported on this device: " + ImageFormat_::pretty_print(image_format) + " - " + PixelFormat_::pretty_print(pixel_format))
153 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
154 );
155 }
156
157 HRESULT result = _impl->EnableVideoInput(
158 static_cast<BMDDisplayMode>(image_format)
159 , static_cast<BMDPixelFormat>(pixel_format)
160 , static_cast<BMDVideoInputFlags>(flags.bits())
161 );
162 if (result != S_OK) {
163 std::string errdesc;
164 switch(result) {
165 case E_INVALIDARG:
166 errdesc = "Invalid video mode, pixel format or flags";
167 break;
168 case E_ACCESSDENIED:
169 errdesc = "Unable to access the hardware or input stream currently active";
170 break;
171 case E_OUTOFMEMORY:
172 errdesc = "Unable to create a new frame";
173 break;
174 default:
175 errdesc = "Unknown error";
176 break;
177 }
178
179 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
180 << errmsg(errdesc)
181 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
182 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkVideoInput::EnableVideoInput")
183 );
184 }
185
186 _enabled = true;
187 return *this;
188 }
189
190
191 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::disable() {
192 if (!_impl) load_impl();
193
194 const auto result = _impl->DisableVideoInput();
195
196 // E_ACCESSDENIED means that the stream is already stopped
197 if (result != S_OK) {
198 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
199 << errmsg("Unable to stop disable video input")
200 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkInput::StopStreams")
201 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
202 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
203 );
204 }
205
206 return *this;
207 }
208
209
210 DeviceInputInterface& DeviceInputInterface::set_callback(CaptureCallback&& callback) {
211 stop();
212
213 _callback = callback;
214 _callback._owner = this;
215 assert(this);
216
217 if (const HRESULT result = _impl->SetCallback(&_callback) != S_OK) {
218 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
219 << errmsg("Unable to set callback")
220 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkInput::SetCallback")
221 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
222 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
223 );
224 }
225
226 return *this;
227 }
228
229
230 std::vector<DisplayMode> DeviceInputInterface::get_all_supported_display_modes() {
231 if (!_impl) load_impl();
232
233 std::vector<DisplayMode> display_modes;
234
235 IDeckLinkDisplayMode* mode = nullptr;
236 IDeckLinkDisplayModeIterator* it = nullptr;
237
238 if (const HRESULT result = _impl->GetDisplayModeIterator(&it) != S_OK) {
239 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
240 << errmsg("Unknown failure when calling GetDisplayModeIterator")
241 << decklink_command("IDeckLilnkInput::GetDisplayModeIterator")
242 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
243 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
244 );
245 }
246
247 assert(it);
248 while (it->Next(&mode) == S_OK) {
249 display_modes.emplace_back(mode);
250 }
251
252 return display_modes;
253 }
254
255
256 bool DeviceInputInterface::supports_pixel_format(
257 const ImageFormat image_format,
258 const PixelFormat pixel_format,
259 const BitMask<VideoInputFlags>& flags
260 ) {
261 if (!_impl) load_impl();
262
263 DisplayModeSupport support = supports_video_mode(image_format, pixel_format, flags);
264
265 // Supported can be SupportedWithConversion or Supported. Both are OK for us
266 return (support != DisplayModeSupport::NotSupported);
267 }
268
269
270 std::vector<PixelFormat> DeviceInputInterface::get_supported_pixel_formats(
271 const ImageFormat image_format
272 ) {
273 std::vector<PixelFormat> formats;
274
275 for (const auto pixel_format: PixelFormat_::Values) {
276 if (pixel_format != PixelFormat::Unknown && supports_pixel_format(image_format, pixel_format))
277 formats.push_back(pixel_format);
278 }
279
280 return formats;
281 }
282
283 //
284 // Input / Output Interface
285 //
286
287 IDeckLinkInput *DeviceInputInterface::get_raw_device() {
288 assert(this);
289 if (!_impl) load_impl();
290
291 assert(_impl);
292 return _impl.get();
293 }

298
299 DeviceInputInterface::DeviceInputInterface(Device *parent_device)
300 : _parent_device(parent_device)
301 {
302 if (!parent_device) {
303 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(null_pointer_error()
304 << errmsg("Cannot create an input device from a null pointer")
305 );
306 }
307 }
308
309
310 DisplayModeSupport DeviceInputInterface::supports_video_mode(
311 const ImageFormat image_format,
312 const PixelFormat pixel_format,
313 const BitMask<VideoInputFlags>& flags
314 ) {
315 BMDDisplayModeSupport is_supported;
316 HRESULT result = _impl->DoesSupportVideoMode(
317 static_cast<BMDDisplayMode>(image_format)
318 , static_cast<BMDPixelFormat>(pixel_format)
319 , static_cast<BMDVideoInputFlags>(flags.bits())
320 , &is_supported
321 , /* resultDisplayMode = */ nullptr
322 );
323
324 if (result != S_OK) {
325 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
326 << errmsg("An unknown error occured whilst calling IDeckLinkInput::DoesSupportVideoMode on " + ImageFormat_::pretty_print(image_format))
327 << decklink_device(_parent_device->get_display_name())
328 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
329 );
330 }
331
332 return static_cast<DisplayModeSupport>(is_supported);
333 }
334
335
336 void DeviceInputInterface::load_impl() {
337 load_interface(
338 _parent_device->_device_impl.get(), IID_IDeckLinkInput, _impl, "input"
339 );
340 assert(_impl);
341 }
